/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with power lines and trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on either side. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding life to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the photograph.
